message.body: Hey bud. Do u happen to get a hookup for franklin institute for weddings???
Eek. Maybe my own if I were lucky... Why? Are you having one?!?!?!
I can put in a word, but I've done that before and still works out to expensive. Lol!
Lol. Yes but no time soon. But since we poor we have to plan early
Ha. Ok. Anything would help. Any estimate on the cost?
Let me see if I can get an average. I should know...
Lol save that for the engagement...this is just we need to figure out how much money we need to be saving type of thing. Lol
Ya that would be a big help thx
Starts at $120 per person plus $5k rental fee. The figure I hear most is $200 per person.
Gee golly. At that rate we can invite the bridal party and maybe 2 guests lol
Ugh, I know. It's a racket.
Ps: don't say "gee golly." I don't really know what to do with that. I can't picture you saying it, so then you morph into the being of an ~ber 70s nerd.
